name: 林佩怡
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
2010 Fall Semester 
week 	Reading & Writing  	         Listening & Speaking
1	Orientation / Warm-up 
2	Unit 1 Untruth and Consequences	
3        Unit 1 Untruth and Consequences
4	Unit 1 Information  Overload
	
5	Unit 2 Dreams Never Die	
6        Unit 2 Dreams Never Die
7	Unit 2 The Achilles Heel
	
8	Review	
9	Campus-wide Proficiency Test 1 and/or Mid-term exam

10	Unit 3 Dying for Their Beliefs 	
11	Unit 3 Dying for Their Beliefs 	
12       Unit 3 Early to Bed, Early to Rise
		
13	Unit 4 Animal Intelligence	
14       Unit 4 Animal Intelligence
15	Unit 4 Animal Intelligence	
16	Unit 5 Longevity	
17       Unit 5 Longevity
		
18	Campus-wide Proficiency Test 2 and/or Final exam
scorePolicy:
B.各班正規課程成績 = 各班期末考前一週測驗成績*40%+各班平時成績*60%
C.期中會考測驗成績
D.期末會考測驗成績

E.學期總成績=
B*70%+
C*15%
D*15%
materials:
Northstar 4: Reading and Writing. 3rd Edition.
Northstar 4: Listening and Speaking. 3rd Edition.
